channel.title: Kickassvps?
channel.description:
Okay before i get started, i apologize if this is in the wrong section, couldn't find a better place to put this.
Okay, i had vpsland yesterday i cancelled it because they blocked the ports when they said it didn't. Now i'm thinking of getting kickassvps, [ 34 dollars ] It comes with windows 2008 1 gb ram etc.. So, is kickassvps a good company? do i need to do extra things like on vpsland? is the ports already opened? is it good? Is it easy to use, - Get jdk, get source, put on and use the vps ip? Help is needed.

item.title: Kickassvps?
item.dc:creator: @Exstasy Exstasy
item.description:
@Exstasy wrote:

[quote=“ristler123, post:3, topic:418871”][quote author=modzilla link=topic=521410.msg3788786#msg3788786 date=1319117575]
I know Linux is better than any windows vps look into that
[/quote]
No, don’t know how to use linux.[/quote]

i’ve aways used vpsland and they never seem to fuck over my ports.

Read full topic
